channel.title: Ahhhhh Weather!
channel.description:
Weather Has Spontaneously Came onto my server how do i get ri of it and if theres a command please post it. Thanks =][br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 01:22:30 PM[/size][hr]i have [code]::nosnow[/code] but thats for admins only. Any Way To Permanetly cancel it..
PS Do i need to notepad for weather like other servers?

item.title: Ahhhhh Weather!
item.dc:creator: @nov9862 nov9862
item.description:
@nov9862 wrote:

Thanks, i should have known… though weather was in a diff file. Thanks =]

Read full topic

item.title: Ahhhhh Weather!
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Source File>>Data>>Weather. You should see this.

[code][WEATHER]
Weather = 2

[EOF]

[/code]

If not, something similar. To remove the weather, (No weather) just change the number to 0.

Read full topic
